name: Sokolov Style
description:
Now we can all paint like the exceptionally talented painter, sculptor, scientist, inventor, writer, world traveler, and philosopher. Anton Sokolov!

Images captured in and around Dunwall (The beautiful main location of Dishonored)

For best results, please try setting the LoRA strength between 0.7 - 0.95

Please consider joining my Patreon! Advanced SD tutorials, settings explanations, adult-art, from a female content creator (me!) patreon.com/theally
